banner.line2: #Top Tier Custom Backpacks Factory in Myanmar

p1.pre: At Better Bags, we provide a
p1.post: solutions for your backpack needs—including material sourcing, sampling, mass production, strict quality control, and global delivery.

banner.p2: With more than 20 years of experience serving international brands from Japan, South Korea, the United States, and Europe, we manufacture a wide variety of bags: travel bags, backpacks, shoulder bags, tote bags, and more—tailored to your exact requirements.
banner.p3: Our competitive pricing and sustainable production options make us the perfect partner for businesses, organizations, and events of any scale.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.desc: To empower global brands and partners by delivering innovative, high-quality, and cost-effective backpack solutions—manufactured responsibly and guided by integrity, craftsmanship, and customer-centric service at every step.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.desc: To be recognized worldwide as the most trusted and forward-thinking backpack manufacturing partner—setting industry benchmarks in quality, innovation, sustainability, and operational excellence, while creating lasting value for our clients, employees, communities, and the environment.

values.title: Integrity & Transparency
values.desc: We conduct our business with honesty, accountability, and the highest ethical standards—building trust with every commitment to our customers, employees, and partners.

values.title: Pursuit of Excellence
values.desc: We are dedicated to quality, precision, and continuous improvement—striving to exceed expectations across every order, partnership, and interaction.

values.title: Customer Focus
values.desc: Our clients' needs drive every decision. We anticipate challenges, act responsively, and tailor solutions to ensure our customers' enduring success.

values.title: Innovation & Progress
values.desc: We embrace change and bring creativity to all aspects of design, production, and problem-solving—enabling us to offer cutting-edge products and manufacturing processes.

values.title: Sustainability & Responsibility
values.desc: We are committed to sustainable sourcing, minimizing our environmental impact, and fostering safe, fair, and respectful working conditions for all.

values.title: Collaboration & Empowerment
values.desc: We value teamwork, diverse perspectives, and empowering every team member—cultivating a culture where people, ideas, and partnerships flourish.

company.title: Better Bags Myanmar Company Limited
company.p1: Founded in 2003, Better Bags Myanmar specializes in the OEM/ODM manufacturing of premium backpacks, designed for a global clientele. Our comprehensive capabilities cover leisure, travel, climbing, and fashion bags, crafted from responsibly sourced polyester, cotton, and synthetic leather.
company.p2: Our story began in Shenzhen, China, where our founder, Mr. Li Guangtong, gained deep expertise working with top international brands. Driven by a vision of global excellence, we later established a major facility in Qingdao and, following thorough research, launched our state-of-the-art production base in Yangon, Myanmar in 2023.
company.p3: Over the past two decades, we have proudly partnered with world-renowned brands such as Anello, New Balance, Nike, Fila, and more. Our unwavering commitment to quality, reliability, and proactive service has enabled us to maintain long-term partnerships—especially with leading Japanese brands for over 15 years.
company.p4: Today, Better Bags stands at the intersection of tradition and innovation. By optimizing our dual-factory model, investing in people and systems, and adhering strictly to international standards, we meet the evolving needs of global customers with efficiency, flexibility, and future-oriented solutions. As we look ahead, our goal is to set new benchmarks in both client satisfaction and responsible manufacturing.

jay.title: Welcome, I'm Jay.
jay.desc1: As the next-generation leader of Better Bags — a family-owned manufacturer with global vision—I draw upon more than 8 years of study and professional experience in Pennsylvania, United States. Being an alumnus of
jay.desc2: I am proud to bring proven international expertise as well as cross-cultural communication skills to our clients and partners. My mission is to bridge the best of East and West, ensuring every partner enjoys premium products, seamless project communication, and reliable after-sales support—no matter where you are in the world.

list.title: Flexibility
list.desc: With manufacturing centers in both Qingdao, China and Yangon, Myanmar, we offer unparalleled flexibility to meet our customers' diverse needs. Our Myanmar factory is fully equipped to handle large-volume production with speed and efficiency, while our long-established Qingdao facility (20+ years of expertise) excels in design, sampling, sourcing, and personalized project management. Whether you need rapid prototyping, small custom batches, or are scaling up to large bulk orders, our dual-factory model ensures your requirements are fulfilled with agility and precision.

list.title: Communication
list.desc: At Better Bags, effective communication is the foundation of all our partnerships. Our founder, Mr. Li Guangtong, built our business on the trust and high standards of Japanese clients—reflecting a deep understanding of international requirements. Drawing on our multicultural team—including professionals with extensive study and work experience in the United States—we seamlessly connect with global customers. We are especially adept at bridging cultural and language gaps, ensuring clarity, transparency, and a smooth cooperation experience from start to finish.

list.title: Quality Control
list.desc: The backbone of our reputation is unwavering quality control. Years of collaboration with demanding markets like Japan have forged a meticulous approach at every stage of production, from sourcing to final inspection. Our experienced QA teams ensure that every order not only meets but often exceeds international standards for craftsmanship, durability, and reliability—guaranteeing peace of mind with every delivery.

list.title: Competitive Pricing
list.desc:
Our primary production base in Myanmar gives us a significant cost advantage—production costs here are much lower than in China, and even compared to other Southeast Asian countries such as Vietnam and Thailand, we are able to offer more competitive prices under the same quality standards. This means our clients receive high-quality products at a better value, without compromise.

Myanmar's cost efficiency perfectly complements our Qingdao hub, which specializes in design, sampling, and sourcing. By combining Myanmar's unbeatable production pricing and Qingdao's strong development capabilities, we achieve the "sweet spot" in global manufacturing—offering clients both outstanding quality and truly competitive pricing.

customization.title: Customization Options
customization.intro: As an experienced backpack manufacturer, we provide a comprehensive range of tailor-made solutions for clients worldwide. From initial concept to production and delivery, every detail is customizable to ensure your products stand out in the market.

features.title: Extensive Backpack Styles
features.desc: No matter the style you need, our experienced R&D team can guide you through the selection process to ensure you find the ideal fit for your project.

features.title: Multiple Sizes and Capacities
features.desc: Flexible size configurations to fit any scenario, all customizable with smart compartments and layouts.
highlights: Extra Large (60L+): Long Trip/Pro Use/Special Needs

features.title: Superior & Eco-friendly Materials
features.desc: Premium global materials, responsibly sourced. All can be custom colored, processed, or finished to match your vision!
highlights: Any custom color, print, or finish

features.title: Professional Color Solutions
features.desc: Achieve flawless color consistency and bring your brand vision to life with our comprehensive color services.

features.title: Custom Imprint & Branding
features.desc: Your brand, your way. Multiple logo and graphic application methods for a lasting impression.

features.title: Accessories & Hardware
features.desc: Upgrade every detail—premium zippers, buckles, trims. Each part can be color- and function-customized.
highlights: Buckles: Plastic, Metal, Magnetic, Quick-release, D-rings

features.title: Enhanced Functional Features
features.desc: Tailored features for safety, tech, travel, or specialist needs—because every use case is unique.
highlights: Weatherproofing: Coated fabrics, Rain covers, Ventilated backs
Tech: USB ports, cable routing, reflective details, LED integration

features.title: Private Label & Logo Customization
features.desc: Fully customizable branding—even for private label requirements.

customization.ready:
Ready to bring your vision to life?
Contact us for a tailor-made solution—and discover why top brands worldwide trust us as their manufacturing partner.

services.title: Optimized All-in-One Service for Mass Production

steps.title: Handle Customer Inquiry
steps.desc: Send us an inquiry and share the details of your project. Our dedicated team will quickly respond to understand your needs and expectations.

steps.title: Manufacture Quotation
steps.desc: If your project fits our standard MOQ and production capabilities, we will promptly provide an initial quotation based on your tech pack, selected fabric quality, and requested quantity.

steps.title: Sample Development
steps.desc: Once the quotation is approved, we move forward with sample development. This ensures that quality and specifications are confirmed before bulk production begins.

steps.title: Bulk Production
steps.desc: After you confirm the order and provide a deposit, we commence bulk production—strictly following all agreed specifications with careful attention to detail.

steps.title: Quality Control
steps.desc: Our rigorous QC procedures include 100% end-line inspections and application of AQL 2.5 standards for final checks. We also welcome third-party QC to further guarantee quality and transparency.

steps.title: Packaging & Shipping
steps.desc: After quality confirmation, your products are carefully packaged and shipped in bulk to your designated warehouse, ensuring safe and efficient delivery.

items.q: What should I prepare before contacting you?
items.a: Please have your tech pack (or clear design sketches), estimated order quantity, preferred materials, and any special requirements ready. The more specific your brief, the faster and more accurate our quotation and recommendations.

items.q: Do you provide a catalogue of your products?
items.a: No, we are a pure OEM/ODM manufacturer and do not have our own product catalogue. All products are custom-made to client specifications.

items.q: Can you share samples or images of previous work for reference?
items.a: Due to strict NDAs with our clients, we cannot share images of previous products. However, we highly recommend ordering a sample or arranging a factory tour to assess our craftsmanship and quality for yourself.

items.q: Can you provide references from existing clients?
items.a: While we cannot share client contacts due to confidentiality, we welcome video calls, sample reviews, and factory tours for your assurance.

items.q: Do I get a dedicated project manager or team?
items.a: Yes, every project is assigned to a dedicated account manager and project team for smooth, timely and personalized service.

items.q: How will I know the timeline for my project?
items.a: After confirmation, we provide a detailed production schedule covering sampling, production, and shipment milestones, keeping you informed at every stage.

items.q: Do you accept OEM and ODM orders?
items.a: Yes, we only accept OEM/ODM orders. We do not manufacture or sell our own branded products.

items.q: What is your typical Minimum Order Quantity (MOQ)?
items.a: Our general MOQ is 150 pieces per design and color. Lower quantities may be considered upon request.

items.q: How is your quotation process structured?
items.a: We first provide an estimated quotation based on your tech pack and details. A final binding quote is issued after prototype/sample approval. Prices are quoted FOB (Yangon) or Ex-Works, excluding additional surcharges from suppliers.

items.q: What are your payment terms?
items.a: Standard terms are 50% deposit with purchase order (PO), and the balance before shipment. LC for the balance is possible for qualified clients.

items.q: Can you provide materials with special certifications (e.g., OEKO-TEX, GRS, GOTS)?
items.a: Yes, we can source and certify materials to various international standards. Let us know your compliance requirements in advance.

items.q: How many rounds of sample revisions are allowed?
items.a: Sample revisions are case by case. Most orders include at least one revision; we can offer additional revision packages as needed.

items.q: What is your lead time for sample/prototype production?
items.a: Samples are generally ready in 1–2 weeks, depending on material availability and scheduling.

items.q: What materials will you use if the specified ones are unavailable?
items.a: We will use the closest available substitute for development, and inform you of any differences before proceeding.

items.q: Does the sample fee include shipping?
items.a: No, the sample fee does not cover shipping or potential third-party costs (e.g. molds, plates). Express shipping (e.g. FedEx, DHL) can be arranged at additional cost.

items.q: Do you provide pre-production samples (PP) for approval?
items.a: Yes, a PP sample must be formally approved by you before mass production begins.

items.q: Can we make changes after bulk production begins?
items.a: Usually not, as materials are ordered and production started. We may accept small changes if timing and resources allow, but this could affect delivery and cost.

items.q: How do I receive production progress updates?
items.a: We provide milestone-based progress updates, and can share photos or videos from your order upon request.

items.q: How do you ensure production efficiency and flexibility?
items.a: We implement LEAN methodologies and continuous improvement, optimizing lines for cost, efficiency, and order size flexibility.

items.q: What is your standard production lead time?
items.a: Typical lead time from PO to completion is 13–15 weeks, but may vary with product complexity and volume.

items.q: What's your main port of loading?
items.a: All orders ship FOB Yangon Port, Yangon, Myanmar, unless otherwise arranged.

items.q: Can you customize packaging/handling for my orders?
items.a: Yes, we offer packaging customization and can help with labeling, bundling, carton specifications and even special shipping needs.

items.q: Are you able to help with export documentation and compliance?
items.a: Yes, we will provide all necessary export documents (e.g., invoice, packing list, COO, Form E) and can support any special certifications required.

items.q: How do you ensure quality and material consistency?
items.a: Incoming materials are strictly inspected and verified. QC stations at every major step catch deviations early. All orders undergo 100% end-of-line inspection, and we welcome third-party QC upon client request.

items.q: Do you provide independent audit or inspection support?
items.a: Absolutely. We welcome third-party audits, remote factory visits, and client inspections at any step.

items.q: How do you handle defective products or production complaints?
items.a: We investigate all reports thoroughly and, depending on the situation, provide repair, replacement or negotiated settlement.

items.q: Do you offer any warranty or after-sales guarantee?
items.a: We require clients to inspect all shipments within 14 days. As we manufacture to your specifications, we do not offer extended warranties.

items.q: Can you provide technical support for bag pattern or hardware development?
items.a: Yes, our experienced team can advise on feasibility, cost, construction methods, and component selection.

items.q: Don't see your question here?
items.a: Please contact us directly – our team is always ready to assist with anything you need.

items.name: Sarah Chen
items.quote: Better Bags delivered exceptional quality on our custom backpack line. Their attention to detail and commitment to deadlines exceeded our expectations.

items.name: Michael Torres
items.quote: Working with Better Bags transformed our product development process. Their engineering team provided valuable design input that improved our final product.

items.name: Yuki Tanaka
items.quote: From sampling to bulk production, Better Bags maintained consistent quality. Their communication throughout the process was outstanding.

items.name: David Muller
items.quote: We have been partnering with Better Bags for over 3 years. Their competitive pricing and reliable delivery make them our go-to manufacturer.
